snippet.title: Ghost Recon: Future Soldier | LAUNCH TRAILER [North America]
snippet.description:
The wait is nearly over. See the launch trailer for Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, available Tuesday, May 22. It's not too late to pre-order at Gamestop to receive the Signature Edition with exclusive upgrades.

Pre-order here: http://bit.ly/JnZMbK

#FightLikeAGhost

Official Network: http://www.ghostrecon.com/network
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ghostrecon
Twitter: http://twitter.com/GhostRecon
